main: ^Purple Warrier: Im the best ninja this side of the sun!
^Have you seen a brown haired girl in a pink shirt?
npc: ^Purple Warrier: You say that but I bet you didnt see this?
npcContinued: ^Purple Warrier: See! Im so fast you cant even tell what Im doing!
info: ^Purple Warrier: hmmm, there was this brown haired girl trying to free this ballpit, maybe her? I cant remember her shirt colour though?
